Description: On I-495 at mile marker 52.6 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 161.3 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The south right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-66 at mile marker 40 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The west exit 40 narrows.

Description: On VA-100 in the County of Carroll, in the vicinity of Amelia Ln; Rt. 1104E/W (Carroll County), motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.

Description: On I-64 in the City of Norfolk, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel West, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All east lanes are closed.
